snippet.title: Black Morph v0.3.0 (Full Demo) (AGS) Free Retro LowRes Pixel Art Point and Click Adventure like LOOM
snippet.description:
A beautiful game in only 240x135 pixels using only 16 colors (all from Dawnbringer's 16 color palette) that gets you from the first moment on. Haunting music, innovative gameplay, fantastic graphics and tricky puzzles make this game a unique experience.
Go play it now!
_________________________________________________

Join the Future Vintage Gaming Discord server:
https://discord.gg/m5eaZh8

SUPPORT
play the games, have fun, leave a tip!
https://toxic-tuba.itch.io/
__________________________________________________

Synopsis:
As a Black Morph, use your ability to turn into living things to make your way through an enchanting forest.


Winner of the MAGS competition January 2017.
Pick of the month May 2017.
Winner of Maggies 2017 (best MAGS game of 2017)
Winner of the best Gameplay and best Puzzles AGS Award 2017



Credits:
selmiak - Graphics and game design
Creamy - Code and game design
Emont - Music and SFX 


Download:
http://www.adventuregamestudio.co.uk/site/games/game/2123/
Mirror:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=137ZMlYQGAjkVS9ycVa3O8sKX6z9VOVcS



All Future Vintage Gaming Videos are also on Odysee:
https://odysee.com/@FutureVintageGaming:b

Play some Indie AGS Games I worked on:
http://www.adventuregamestudio.co.uk/forums/index.php?action=profile;u=9350


Intro Visuals by Future Vintage Gaming
Intro Music by moleman
https://soundcloud.com/molemandnb/moleman-sanctuary
Outro Music by Low:r
https://soundcloud.com/lowrmusic/separate


[50]
